trans-unit.resname: F15·1 | Frenzied Goblin | Card Name
F15·1 | Frenzied Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

trans-unit.resname: F15·3 | Hordeling Outburst | Card Name
F15·3 | Hordeling Outburst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: F15·4 | Suspension Field | Card Name
F15·4 | Suspension Field | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

trans-unit.resname: F15·5 | Abzan Beastmaster | Card Name
F15·5 | Abzan Beastmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

trans-unit.resname: F15·6 | Frost Walker | Card Name
F15·6 | Frost Walker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

trans-unit.resname: F15·7 | Path to Exile | Card Name
F15·7 | Path to Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: F15·12 | Anticipate | Card Name
F15·12 | Anticipate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
